Html:
From a fresh 24026 compilation. Select Priest class and program crash. (With a French Windows) :
************** Texte de l'exception **************
System.NullReferenceException: La référence d'objet n'est pas définie à une instance d'un objet.
   à Rawr.StatConversion..ctor(Character _character) dans ...\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\Rawr-24206\Rawr.Base\StatConversion.cs:ligne 121
   à Rawr.Character.get_StatConversion() dans ...\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\Rawr-24206\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:ligne 377
   à Rawr.HolyPriest.CalculationsHolyPriest.GetCharacterStats(Character character, Item additionalItem) dans ...\Visual Studio 2008\Projects\Rawr-24206\Rawr.HolyPriest\CalculationsHolyPriest.cs:ligne 244
   à Rawr.HolyPriest.CalculationsHolyPriest.GetCharacterCalculations(Character character, Item additionalItem) dans...Visual Studio 2008\Projects\Rawr-24206\Rawr.HolyPriest\CalculationsHolyPriest.cs:ligne 128
......

Having a look at the code, it seems that in StatConversion.cs that RatingConversionBase60 and RatingConversionTable are declare but never allocated.
Thanks, I will commit a fix that hopefully fixes this right now, let me know if it helps.

Ok I just regenerate with latest source and it WORKS !
Thanks :)
Hope the model gives you the information you seek, thanks for the bug report.
